about_the_game:
The Adventures of Crackhead Jack: Overdose Edition finds you controlling the titular character on a journey to reclaim a bag of coke. On such a journey, you might meet strange characters, and possibly do excessive amounts of other drugs to defeat anyone who stands in your way. Look no further, because this is the definitive version.

Paid The Cost To Be The Boss

Jack is no chosen one. There is no world to save. Only things we crave. His eccentric actions might inevitably cement him as a saviour. Invade and investigate into the depths of the black market. Make chump change in the form of the region's "sheks" off bums on the street. Fetch sketchy items for plenty of weird people. Witness Jack fail to reason with the evil of the real world.

Really Basic Turn Based Combat

Everyone's agreed to take turns when you fight. Enemies walk around in red coats, waiting for their chance to strike. There are dozens of "unique" enemies with stupid names and childish graphics. Skills are of course special attacks that may have exclusive effects and statuses. Equip protection kits and grab your favourite weapon from the nearest Equips shop to give you attack boosts and basic side effects in battle.

Consumables Galore...

There are plenty of vendors just minutes away from you who aren't afraid to give you a good deal on exquisite product. Consume to your heart's content. You might experience some otherworldly visions.

The Luxury of Time

Overdose Edition includes all-new side quests and story adjustments that shamelessly extend the game's playtime. Who am I kidding? It's only around 5 hours long.

Trying To Be Funny

Speaking of comedy experience, the world tries to convince you that it's got what it takes to get a laugh out of you. The game specializes in trying to capitalize on any stupid moment to try and be funny, and it's up to the player to decide if it actually is.

detailed_description:
Overdose Edition


This is the definitive refresh/remaster/redux/update of The Adventures of Crackhead Jack: Classic, released in May 2016, now for all to enjoy on Steam.

Live, laugh, love, experience, feel, and enjoy the finest of the finer things:

  • overhaul of random encounters: see where and when an enemy might attack you
  • new areas and towns for Jack to explore and inquire about his desired item.
  • over 50 new attack animations to replace the previous style
  • new items, weapons, gear, and status effects
  • completely rewritten dialogue and flavour text
  • UI enhancements in various areas
  • new and improved state-of-the-art sprites (no default RPGMaker asset flips here)
  • Better XInput support so you can control Jack with both a stick and a d-pad if you prefer
  • extra system options (upscaled game window, BGM/BGS volume control, toggle overlay effects)
  • Steam achievement and cloud save support
  • playable on the Steam Deck
  • play the game keeping Jack completely sober
  • a new and original soundtrack from artists like Sam Wakeman, Yung Data, Mason Rhodes, and Lil Daddy Kane
